title: Is KDSPY the Best Niche Research Tool for Amazon KDP
description:
Is KDSPY the Best Niche Research Tool, and the the most affordable entry level software available on the market?
In this video, I walk you through how I use KDSP for Amazon KDP Niche Research and some of the powerful tool this software offers if you are looking for data to support your book creation steps.
